root.Summary: 1: Parashar B, Port J, Arora S, Christos P, Trichter S, Nori D, Wernicke AG.Analysis of stereotactic radiation vs. wedge resection vs. wedge resection plusCesium-131 brachytherapy in early stage lung cancer.
